name: swepee-monorepo
description: Swepee - Monorepo with Web, Backend and Mobile App

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../app && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf web/node_modules && rm -rf backend/node_modules && rm -rf app/node_modules
scripts.lint:all: cd web && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm run test && cd ../backend && npm run test:e2e

author: Swepee Team
